channel.title: Trying to make message send once and not 4 times. HELP!

item.title: Trying to make message send once and not 4 times. HELP!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

I know the title kind of seems sad, like I don’t know how to make a message that is sent to you only send once and not 4 times, but this is harder than it seems. This is what it’s doing when I try and click on the dark bow:

Now, I search for that message in my client class and I find this code:

if (playerLevel[playerRanged] - CLRanged < 0) { sendMessage( "You need " + CLRanged + " " + statName[playerRanged] + " to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; }

It only says it once there… I use an allstarscape source by the way. I’ve also tried searching to see if maybe this code was in my client class in 4 different places but it’s not. The dark bow id is 15156 and here is the code for needing level 80 to wield it:

public int GetCLRanged(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == 15156) { return 80; } }

Why is it sending 4 messages and not one?

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to make message send once and not 4 times. HELP!
